channel.title: Dockerfile安装常用环境 on
channel.description: Recent content in Dockerfile安装常用环境 on

item.title: Dockerfile安装常用环境
item.description: [TOC] mysql FROM mysql EXPOSE 3306 # 编译 # docker build -t mysql-master . # 启动 # docker run -p 3306:3306 --name mysql-master -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root -itd mysql-master oracle FROM absolutapps/oracle-12c-ee EXPOSE 1521 # 编译 # docker build -t oracle12 . # 启动 # docker run -itd --name oracle12 --privileged -p 8081:8080 -p 1521:1521 absolutapps/oracle-12c-ee # 账号: SYSTEM 密码: oracle SERVICE_NAME:ORCL redis https://hub.docker.com/_/redis
